Detailed Description

SensorConfig class configures the sensor module attached with the "Particle".

The main functionality of this class is to configure the sensor board which is attached to a "Particle". Configuration of the sensor board means which sensor information to receive and at what rate. This class is functional when the OK button on the ConfigureDialog GUI is clicked.
